title: Left a Tutorial game and bad stuff happened
body: I left a tutorial game and exit leauge when i logged back in i was on the recconect screen and when i reconnected it took me to a black screen then an error popped up and now i'm stuck in reconnect

replies.body: What kind of error did you have pop up? It sounds like the client is trying to place you back into the tutorial in case you force closed it as opposed to exiting the game through the menu.
i exited from menu because i couldn't connect to any games

Ahhhh alrighty. Sounds like this is happening due to a ghost game. Essentially that game didn't exist anymore, but the end of the game hadn't been recorded to the servers yet. It should stop trying to reconnect you after enough time!

oh ok well i just uninstalled and reinstalled. It works now, Thank you very much for helping but it
 is solved :)
Ayyyyy I'm just happy you're able to get back in the game ^_^!
